endpoints.description: Provides a list of all registered vehicles assigned for material transport.
Registers a new vehicle in the transport monitoring system.
Retrieves a log of all scheduled and completed material deliveries.
Schedules a new material delivery arrangement.
Fetches detailed information about a specific delivery using its ID.
Updates the details of an existing delivery.
Cancels and removes a scheduled delivery by ID.
Retrieves the current supply chain status and detect delays.
Sets up an alert mechanism for specific supply chain events.
Offers optimized routing suggestions for material deliveries to minimize delays and costs.
